metadata.name: User Added To Highly Privileged Group
metadata.comment: Detects addition of users to highly privileged groups via "Net" or "Add-LocalGroupMember".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('localgroup ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-localgroupmember ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('group policy creator owners')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('schema admins'))))

output.summary: Detects addition of users to highly privileged groups via "Net" or "Add-LocalGroupMember".

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrative activity that must be investigated Reference: https://www.huntress.com/blog/slashandgrab-screen-connect-post-exploitation-in-the-wild-cve-2024-1709-cve-2024-1708
